a.title: Permalink to Governance Committee Meeting – Tuesday. April 21 at 5:00 PM
Permalink to Governance Committee Meeting – Tuesday. April 21 at 5:00 PM

h2.a: Governance Committee Meeting – Tuesday. April 21 at 5:00 PM

div.p: Lycée Français de la Nouvelle-Orléans will be holding a public meeting of the Governance Committee on Tuesday, April 21, 2020, at 5:00 PM. The committee will meet virtually per recent COVID-19 guidelines. Please click the link below to join the webinar: https://zoom.us/j/96948202302Dial-in Info: US: +13126266799, or +19292056099, US: +1 312 626 6799 […]

a.title: Permalink to Vacation at Home, student projects by Ms. Susy’s Spanish class.
Permalink to Vacation at Home, student projects by Ms. Susy’s Spanish class.

h2.a: Vacation at Home, student projects by Ms. Susy’s Spanish class.

div.p: We hope everyone is enjoying the first day of Spring Break! We wanted to share projects from Ms. Suzy’s Spanish class. In this activity students take a virtual trip and describe in Spanish where they went. The activity is called #YOVIAJOENCASA (#travelhome) Can you guess where each of these students went? SEE ALL THE PROJECTS […]

a.title: Permalink to 4.3.20 Positive Messages from our Staff

div.p: Pending approval by the Board of Directors, the 2020-2021 school calendar is available HERE.

BID OPENING UPDATE In accord with Section 2 of Governor’s Proclamation Number JBE 2020-32: Additional Measures for COVID-19 Public Health Emergency, due to COVID-19, 1601 Leonidas, LLC will hold its Bid Opening virtually. The live stream will be available beginning at 4:00 pm on Thursday, April 2nd. 1601 Leonidas, LLC will utilize the online platform […]

a.title: Permalink to 3.23.20 Letter from our Director of Academics, Sophie Capmartin
Permalink to 3.23.20 Letter from our Director of Academics, Sophie Capmartin

h2.a: 3.23.20 Letter from our Director of Academics, Sophie Capmartin

div.p: Dear Lycée families, I hope you are all doing well and adjusting to your new daily routines. All of us are going through an unprecedented life experience that can bring a lot of anxiety. The implementation of meaningful online educational opportunities aim to support students and parents in a time when most things are uncertain. The […]
Background Checks are obtained for a $5 fee at the following address:2800 Perdido St. New Orleans, 70119

a.title: Permalink to Brevet and DELF B1 Presentation
Permalink to Brevet and DELF B1 Presentation

div.p: Dear families, if you were unable to attend our café about the Brevet et DELF B1 Diploma, you can access these presentations on our website under the tab Academics (Academics > Middle school > Academic Programs). The DELF B1 is usually taken by LFNO students in 8th grade while the Brevet is a French national exam […]
Our handy back to school 2019-2020 Parent Packet is now available for download HERE. Additional information will be presented at Meet & Greet on Monday, August 12!
Download the 2019-2020 School Calendar | HEREYou can also find this information in a couple of locations:1. Parents > Resources > General Resources tab.2. Parents > School Calendar

a.title: Permalink to Request to Update Information
Permalink to Request to Update Information

div.p: Dear Lycée Families, thank you for all the love and support shown to our faculty and staff during the holiday season. It was a very ‘sweet’ send off and we are getting back with renewed energy. Students are fully engaged in learning, TOC experiences are in full swing, and plans for our overall growth are […]
